name: Ping (itch) (Bulky Spider)
description:
Remember those monster toys where the sucker stuck to the base until the spring made it go ping?

Well now it features in its very own puzzle platform adventure game especially for the 2019 Lowrezjam here on Itch.

Rendered in a mighty 64x64 pixel environment you can guide our hero using the controls below:

Click mouse to navigate screens

A - Left

D - Right

W - Jump

Mouse to aim and left click to perform super supper spring once collected.
